name: Would you rather...
description: A series of fun would you rather prompts

questions.question: Would you rather fight an adult wolf or a teen grizzly bear
Would you rather swim across a lake of pirhannas or crawl across a field of spiders
Would you rather have iced or hot coffee?

name: Whos going to find the One Piece?
description: A small poll to vote for who will find that legendary treasure.

questions.question: Whos going to find that legendary pirate treasure, THE ONE PIECE?
